## Description {#details}

A handler for state updates occurring while an <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/httprequest">HTTPRequest</a> is performed.

Can trigger the client to abort the request by returning an <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/error">Error</a> from any of its methods.

Definition at line 43 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfod/httpclient-h">HTTPClient.h</a>.
